name: Pocket Pioneers
description:
Discover a new life in a vibrant world filled with friends and endless adventures!

Experience real-time multiplayer adventures in an endearing world with players from around the world! Begin your journey to build a new life in a bustling community of fellow Pioneers and help local citizens. Customize your Pioneer, decorate every corner of your homestead, explore the lands and make new friends along the way. Pocket Pioneers is a charming adventure simulation game where you can interact with thousands of players online, embark on limitless quests and discover the hidden magical secrets of a mysterious continent.

KEY FEATURES:

• Real-time multiplayer action: Play solo or form a Pioneer party of up to 6 friends to collaborate in real-time adventures.
• Complete hundreds of quests: Accept special challenges and fulfill orders from the locals to level up your character. Collect resources and rewards to expand your farm and home.
• Customize your heart out: Pioneer in style and choose from a variety of fun outfits and accessories. Decorate your homestead with quirky items and cool furniture pieces.
• Explore a vast world at your pace: Explore a whimsical world filled with a variety of things to do – go mining in the caves or fishing with Ricardo the cat. Tend to your crops or dance with friends at the beach.
• Grow your friendships: Engage with animal townsfolk and gain their trust by helping them complete tasks and surprising them with gifts.
• Enjoy new seasonal content: Regular events and competitions with player leaderboards mean there are always exciting activities to jump into.
• Craft new tools and delicious recipes: Level up your tools, craft new equipment to create more resources and reap the bounties of the land.
• Experience unforgettable moments and unlock the magic: Discover the personalities of Qu’s citizens and learn more about the secrets of this magical continent.
